problem.markdown:
What is the final temperature of the steam in question C3-01?
( ) 374 °C ( ) 350 K (x) 350 °C ( ) 374 K
[explanation] It has a source of temperature 350 °C. Hence, its temperature will not change. [explanation]
problem.p: What is the final temperature of the steam in question C3-01?

div.p: It has a source of temperature 350 °C. Hence, its temperature will not change.
